titleStmt.title: Description of Religious polemics and Hebrew poetry.

availability.licence: This metadata, accompanying images, and the content of London, British Library, Oriental Manuscripts Or 14009: Religious polemics and Hebrew poetry. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msItem.title: Ma῾aseh nifla᾿ mah she-era῾ bi-yeme Shelomoh ha-melekh מעשה נפלא מה שאירע בימי שלמה המלך

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite square and semi-cursive script of the 18th to 19th century, partly vocalised.

binding.p: BM in-house. Cover: 'Liturgical Works. Heb. & Jud. Ar. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Or. 14009.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Acquired by the British Library in 1981.
